resources.string: Slim-> You are too thin, you need a little more regular and quality nutrition :)
Fit -> You have great body measurement. How you are eating you should continue like this :)
Overweight -> Sometimes you eat the food too much. If you pay more attention to your diet, you can quickly have a fit body :)
Very Overweight -> Too much fat in your body. To solve this problem, you should change your daily diet and not stopped sports :)
